content.DESCRIPTION: An eco-conscious recipe app that encourages users to eat less meat, reducing their carbon footprint.
HOW_I_BUILT_IT: I'm a second-year at the University of Waterloo and as a co-op student I’m actively looking for web development internships. This portfolio showcases my skills and some of the projects I’ve worked on.
